trans-unit.source: Represents the text content of an element or attribute.
trans-unit.target: Representerer tekstinnhold på elementet eller attributtet.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlText"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Xml.XmlText"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Do not instantiate an <xref:System.Xml.XmlText> directly; instead, use methods such as <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.CreateTextNode%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Ikke starte en <xref:System.Xml.XmlText>direkte; i stedet bruke metoder for eksempel <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.CreateTextNode%2A>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.CreateTextNode%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlText>

trans-unit.source: The content of the node; see the <xref:System.Xml.XmlText.Value*> property.
trans-unit.target: Innholdet i noden. Se den <xref:System.Xml.XmlText.Value*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Xml.XmlText.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The parent XML document.
trans-unit.target: Det overordnede XML-dokumentet.

trans-unit.source: Creates a duplicate of this node.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter et duplikat av denne noden.

trans-unit.source: `CloneNode` serves as a copy constructor for nodes.
trans-unit.target: `CloneNode`fungerer som en kopi konstruktør for noder.

trans-unit.source: For text nodes, the cloned node always includes the data value.
trans-unit.target: For tekstnoder inkluderer noden klonede alltid dataverdien.

trans-unit.source: To see how this method behaves with other node types, see the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.CloneNode%2A> method in the `XmlNode` class.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil se hvordan denne metoden fungerer med andre typer, kan du se den <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.CloneNode%2A>metoden i den `XmlNode` klasse.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.CloneNode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The cloned node has no parent (<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.ParentNode%2A> returns `null`).
trans-unit.target: Det klonede har ingen overordnede (<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.ParentNode%2A> returnerer `null`).</xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.ParentNode%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to recursively clone the subtree under the specified node; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to clone only the node itself.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>til rekursivt klone undertreet under den angitte noden. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> til klone noden seg selv.

trans-unit.source: The cloned node.
trans-unit.target: Klonede noden.

trans-unit.source: Gets the local name of the node.
trans-unit.target: Henter den lokale noden.

trans-unit.source: For text nodes, this property returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_#text" name="#text" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen returnerer for tekstnoder, <xref uid="langword_csharp_#text" name="#text" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the qualified name of the node.
trans-unit.target: Henter det kvalifiserte navnet til noden.

trans-unit.source: For text nodes, this property returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_#text" name="#text" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen returnerer for tekstnoder, <xref uid="langword_csharp_#text" name="#text" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the current node.
trans-unit.target: Henter typen for den gjeldende noden.

trans-unit.source: For text nodes, this value is XmlNodeType.Text.
trans-unit.target: Denne verdien er XmlNodeType.Text for tekstnoder.

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent of this node (for nodes that can have parents).
trans-unit.target: Henter overordnet for denne noden (for noder som kan ha overordnede).

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlNode" name="XmlNode" href=""></xref> that is the parent of the current node.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlNode" name="XmlNode" href=""> </xref> som er overordnet den gjeldende noden.

trans-unit.source: If a node has just been created and not yet added to the tree, or if it has been removed from the tree, the parent is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en node har nettopp opprettet og ennå ikke er lagt til i treet, eller hvis den har blitt fjernet fra treet, overordnet <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For all other nodes, the value returned depends on the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.NodeType*> of the node.
trans-unit.target: Alle andre noder verdien som returneres avhenger av <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.NodeType*>av noden.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.NodeType*>

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the possible return values for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ParentNode" name="ParentNode" href=""></xref> property.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor beskriver mulige returverdier for den <xref uid="langword_csharp_ParentNode" name="ParentNode" href=""> </xref> egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the text node that immediately precedes this node.
trans-unit.target: Henter Tekstnoden som kommer umiddelbart før denne noden.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returns <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Splits the node into two nodes at the specified offset, keeping both in the tree as siblings.
trans-unit.target: Deler noden i to noder på den angitte forskyvningen holde både treet som sideordnede.

trans-unit.source: After `SplitText` is called, the original node contains all the content up to the offset point.
trans-unit.target: Etter `SplitText` kalles, opprinnelig noden inneholder alt innhold frem til forskyvningen.

trans-unit.source: A new node of the same type contains all the content at and after the offset point and is inserted as the next sibling of the original node.
trans-unit.target: En ny node av samme type inneholder alt innhold i og etter forskyvningen velger og inn som den neste sideordnet av noden som opprinnelig.

trans-unit.source: When the offset is equal to the length of this node, the new node has no data.
trans-unit.target: Når forskyvningen er lik lengden på denne noden, har noden for nye ingen data.

trans-unit.source: The offset at which to split the node.
trans-unit.target: Forskyvningen som noden skal deles.

trans-unit.source: The new node.
trans-unit.target: Noden for nye.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the node.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir verdien for noden.

trans-unit.source: The content of the text node.
trans-unit.target: Innholdet i text-node.

trans-unit.source: Saves all the children of the node to the specified <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.
trans-unit.target: Lagrer alle underordnede av noden for den angitte <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlText" name="XmlText" href=""></xref> nodes do not have children, so this method has no effect.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlText" name="XmlText" href=""></xref>noder har ikke underordnede, så denne metoden har ingen virkning.

trans-unit.source: This method is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er en Microsoft-filtype til dokumentet objektet Model (DOM).

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlWriter" name="XmlWriter" href=""></xref> to which you want to save.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlWriter" name="XmlWriter" href=""> </xref> som du ønsker å lagre.

trans-unit.source: Saves the node to the specified <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.
trans-unit.target: Lagrer noden på den angitte <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: This method is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er en Microsoft-filtype til dokumentet objektet Model (DOM).

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlWriter" name="XmlWriter" href=""></xref> to which you want to save.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlWriter" name="XmlWriter" href=""> </xref> som du ønsker å lagre.
